sentences.en: A common laboratory source of light is provided by a mercury arc.
sentences.cn: 通常的实验室光源选用汞弧灯.

sentences.en: A group of actors are rehearsing a play about Joan of Arc.
sentences.cn: 一群演员正在排演一出关于圣女贞德的戏。

sentences.en: Arc strikes outside of the welds were avoided.
sentences.cn: 焊缝外要避免电弧穿刺.

sentences.en: Avenues radiate from the Arc de Triomphe in Paris.
sentences.cn: 在巴黎,街道以凯旋门为中心向四方伸展.

sentences.en: His pass described a perfect arc through the leaden sky.
sentences.cn: 他的传球在阴沉的天空中划出了一道完美的弧线。

sentences.en: Joan of Arc was burned at the stake.
sentences.cn: 圣女贞德被烧死在火刑柱上.

sentences.en: Joan of Arc was burnt ( alive ) at the stake.
sentences.cn: 圣女贞德在火刑柱上被 ( 活活 ) 烧死.

sentences.en: Joan of Arc was burnt at the stake .
Joan of Arc was finally canonized by Pope Benedict XV in 1920.
sentences.cn: 圣女贞德终于在1920年由教皇本尼狄克十五世封为圣徒。

sentences.en: The Aleutian chain is a long arc of islands in the North Pacific.
sentences.cn: 阿留申群岛是北太平洋上一长串呈弧形排列的小岛。

sentences.en: The beach swept around in an arc.
The rainbow described an arc in the dark sky.
sentences.cn: 彩虹在昏暗的天空划出了一道圆弧.

sentences.en: The rainbow formed a beautiful arc in the sky.
sentences.cn: 虹在天上成美丽的弧形.

sentences.en: When the moon is new it looks like an arc of light in the sky.
sentences.cn: 新月看起来像天空中的一盏弧形灯.

phrases.tran_cn: 圣女贞德（法国民族女英雄）
金属电弧焊；金属弧焊接
等离子弧，等离子体电弧；电浆弧
等离子弧焊；等离子电弧焊接
